footer.texto_footer_infoUteis_1: IAnes provides accurate recommendations to optimize projects, connect you to suppliers, and find the best solutions.
footer.texto_footer_infoUteis_2p3: to provide the best opportunities for your business.

auth.texto_alert_user_inv: Invalid username! Between 6 and 30 characters. Only letters, numbers, '-' or '_'.
auth.item_listValid_length: The password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.item_listValid_uppercase: The password must have at least one uppercase letter.
auth.item_listValid_lowercase: The password must have at least one lowercase letter.
auth.item_listValid_numbers: The password must have at least 2 numeric digits.
auth.item_listValid_special: The password must have at least 2 special characters.
auth.item_listValid_consecutive: It cannot have more than 2 consecutive identical digits or letters.
auth.item_listValid_irregular: The password cannot contain irregular characters like commas, periods, colons, or spaces.

index.texto_banner_apresent_titulo: A new Intelligence for your Industry.
index.texto_banner_apresent_titulo_desc: Accurate recommendations to optimize projects, connect you to suppliers, and find the best solutions.
index.texto_vantConta_titulo: Create a profile to save your conversations with IAnes.
index.texto_maisSobre_h1IARE: IAnes is an IA-RE (Specialized Recommendation Artificial Intelligence)
index.texto_maisSobre_h1RAILO: IAnes was developed by the RAILO team in partnership with SENAI.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_nenhuma: Select a category by clicking on any topic above.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_oquee: IAnes is an IA-RE (Specialized Recommendation Artificial Intelligence) focused on recommending industrial funding lines. It is developed to assist businesses, entrepreneurs, and organizations by analyzing their specific needs and connecting them to funding programs, subsidies, or governmental and private incentives. By combining machine learning, data analysis, and market intelligence, IAnes makes it easier to access strategic financial resources to boost innovation and business growth.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_paraque: IAnes helps in finding industrial funding lines and other financial support forms, connecting you to the best opportunities to enhance your project or business. It is ideal for companies seeking resources for innovation, expansion, or modernization, simplifying the research process and providing direct access to the most relevant options, saving time and optimizing results.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_porque: With up-to-date data and advanced intelligence, IAnes offers accurate and personalized recommendations to identify industrial and financial aids specific to your sector. From creating new products to accessing technological incentives, the AI ensures you make strategic decisions with confidence, freeing your time to focus on the sustainable growth of your business.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_comofun: You describe your need, such as 'I need resources to expand a production line,' and IAnes processes this information. In seconds, it presents options for industrial funding lines, subsidies, government programs, and detailed guidance. Additionally, it provides insights into market trends and financial support, helping you transform ideas into achievements.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_vantagens1: Recommendations for Industrial Funding: Identifies the best financial opportunities based on your profile and sector.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_vantagens2: Time Savings: Automates the search for financial aid programs, delivering immediate results.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_vantagens3: Customization: Offers suggestions tailored to your business goals and objectives.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_vantagens4: Reliability: Based on updated data, ensuring well-founded decisions.
index.maisIARE_blocoNotas_texto_vantagens5: Broad Support: Whether for startups or large industries, IAnes is accessible and effective at any business stage.
index.texto_sobre_timeRaioDesc: RAILO started as a team dedicated to simple projects during the SENAI Development course classes, focusing on practical activities. Over time, the team evolved, adopting a logo and slogan, and became increasingly recognized. For the Final Project, we collectively decided to use the name Time RAILO to represent our team.
index.texto_sobre_oIanesDesc: Recently, we were challenged to develop an AI specialized in analyzing business projects. This AI, affectionately called 'IA-RE,' which stands for 'Specialized Recommendation Artificial Intelligence,' aims to identify challenges faced by companies and offer didactic and practical recommendations on various aspects, including pricing, suppliers, advantages, and challenges.
index.tp_members_clickExpand: Click the member to see more

PaginaIA.texto_chatIA_noRoomSelect: Select a room to view messages.
PaginaIA.texto_chatIA_botInicialMsg1: Hello! I'm IAnes, I'm here to help. Shall we begin the consultation?
PaginaIA.texto_chatIA_botInicialMsg2: Type 'IANES' in the text box below to begin. I'll ask which language you'd like to proceed with. To end, type 'Exit'.
PaginaIA.texto_chatIA_botInicialMsg3: And answer the questions correctly to get a more accurate result.
